overview: Introduces Arita ware’s 400-year history through the eyes of young and energetic artist Miwa Komatsu. We look forward to seeing the new “Arita” creations that Miwa will create, along with Sakaida Kakiemon XV, who has taken on the preservation of the traditions of Arita ware, that will lead them to the next 100 years.
title: Reintroducing “Arita Ware” to the world!
